ingredients.item: 350g tub Waitrose Chargrilled Vegetable Sauce With Olives

instructions.step: Place the sauce and cod in a small saucepan, cover and cook gently for 6-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the fish is just cooked through.
Meanwhile, microwave the courgette for 1 minute and stir into the cod mixture. Heat the rice according to pack instructions and serve alongside.
